abstract.text: Use LAPACK to solve a linear system and find an interpolating polynomial to construct new points between a series of known data points.
Apple’s implementation of the Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms (BLAS).

inlineContent.text: These matrix operations are specifically tuned for a particular size of matrices.
Entry points that can be called from Fortran programs. You should generally not call these from software written in C.

The types given here are valid for C or C++ and for either PowerPC or Intel processors.   The typedefs shown are for C++ and PowerPC processors; for other, conditionally compiled typedefs, see the header files.
The vecLib framework contains nine C header files (not counting
This document describes the functions declared in the header files
, which contain the interfaces for Apple’s implementation of the Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms (BLAS) API.
